yeah, looks strange, are the files removed when you delete them?
i cant see them anymore but the space isn't freed
have you tried reboot to single usermode and unmounting the drive and run a fsck check?
from terminal type 'sudo 1' this makes your system go in singleuser mode (rescue), next 'umount /dev/sda2' and run 'fsck /dev/sda2', might want to backup important data first ;-)
to exit singleuser mode type exit
it's like running scandisk on windows
